Job Description: Responsibilities:     Provide technical guidance to the team and perform code reviews and approvals     Manage complex code development emphazing reusability and scalability     Maximizing software functionality across front end, business logic layer and database to delight our users     Lead Development of web application with PHP, Python or JS Frameworks, HTML5 and CSS     Finding ideas to enhance existing code and striving for perfection     Working with our business team, development team and project managers to make a fantastic product     Take ownership of the project     Design, develop, test, debug and implement the solution     Prepare technical documentation     Monitor and support the technical team on a daily basis     Ensure project objectives such as quality standards and completion targets are achieved     Be up-to-date with new technologies and architectures, for potential future implementations     Skills Requirement:     Must have experience with developing software for large scale web based systems     Hands-on experience with PHP, Python, Node & SQL     Experienced in HTML, CSS, JavaScript Framework     Other Skills:     Excellent interpersonal and communication skills preferred     Good team player, detail-oriented, creative     Ability to troubleshoot in Linux Environment     Experience:    5 years experience as a senior developer in a software company; ideally developing web/cloud based software applications
